name: Better Bulbapedia
description:
Hides ads, major performance improvements, responsive to fit any screen size, and much more readable. [BETA]
  • No ads, sidebars, or wiki controls
  • No rounded corners (there are so many it strains browsers)
  • No Project banners, Bulbapedia "announcements", or other garbage they like putting up
  • All tables set to "table-layout: fixed" which lets browsers lay out the page much faster
additional_info: Still a bit of a work-in-progress; I’m working on bringing the homepage link/logo and search bar back. It's unlikely this style will ever be perfect; Bulbapedia’s HTML is so bad. Let me know if there are any settings you’d like to have. I'm thinking people who actually edit the wiki may care for some of the MediaWiki UI back.
